name: Hannah
description:
After the death of his parents, Narumi meets a mysterious girl at the cemetery. He is somewhat attracted to her and goes to her country house for a weekend with four other people. However, at night, someone died. The next morning, they discover that the front door broke and they are stuck inside the house with a murderer among them.

A normal game is 15-40 minutes.
Includes 5 different endings.
